title: Donald Bartlett Reid
text:
Donald Bartlett "Don" Reid (30 June 1926 – 11 August 2001) was <a href="Mayor%20of%20Ottawa">Mayor of Ottawa</a>, <a href="Ontario">Ontario</a> from 1965 to 1969.
Reid was born in <a href="Capreol%2C%20Ontario">Capreol, Ontario</a>. He died at the <a href="Ottawa%20Heart%20Institute">Ottawa Heart Institute</a> aged 75, leaving behind his wife Jean (née Armstrong) and five children.
